name: Complete project presentation
description: Finalize slides and rehearse the presentation for the upcoming stakeholder meeting.

name: Review code changes
description: Go through the latest pull requests and provide feedback on code quality and logic.

name: Update documentation
description: Add missing sections and update API references in the project documentation.

name: Fix critical bugs
description: Resolve high-priority issues affecting core functionalities in production.

name: Prepare for client meeting
description: Organize meeting agenda, compile notes, and create an executive summary for the client.

name: Implement new feature
description: Develop and integrate the new dashboard analytics feature into the application.

name: Test application updates
description: Perform regression and functional testing on the recent build before deployment.

name: Conduct user training
description: Prepare training materials and conduct a session for end-users on the new features.

name: Plan next sprint
description: Review backlog items and prioritize tasks for the upcoming sprint planning meeting.

name: Conduct performance reviews
description: Evaluate team members' performance and provide constructive feedback.

name: Optimize database queries
description: Analyze and improve the performance of slow-running database queries.

name: Design new UI mockups
description: Create high-fidelity mockups for the new user interface based on client feedback.
